name: Markdocs
tagline: MarkDocs - Simple Markdown to Documents generator
body:
# Markdocs

Markdocs is a web based application for building website and downloadable documents on the fly from MarkDown text files and folders. 

* **{{ info.theme }}**
* **{{ info.content }}**
* **{{ info.company }}**
* **{{ info.meta_title }}**
* **{{ info.domain }}**
* **{{ info.first }}**
* **{{ info.version }}**	

# Using Custom Variables

Markdocs allows you to set custom variables and then load them throughout the content 
with twig variable syntax.

* **{{ custom.my_var }}**	

**Output:** {{ custom.my_var }}
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
